name: 3-D Skiing
overview: 3-D Skiing is a series of two winter sports-related arcade games for the Apple II. Ski Slalom features a series of flags, which the player must ski through. The game is played from a 3-D perspective from behind the player, and the player must move laterally to avoid incoming obstacles. Points are awarded based upon how fast and accurate the player is at avoiding them. There are 3 difficulty levels that determine course speed, and 3 courses to choose from. Ski Jumper features a small character who attempts to maximize their distance traveled after jumping.
